pr_title: Automate uploading docs to MongoDB Realm website

timeline.message: Add task that automatically upload docs to the MongoDB Realm website
Add redirects to make uploading faster and updates safer.

timeline.bodyText: Is it actually called from somewhere? Or maybe it was just automated yet?

replies.bodyText: No, it isn't called from anywhere automatically yet. Just a manual step you have to call as part of releasing. But I was hoping to be able to automate this soon so a release is just a matter of tagging a commit
